title: UART and ADC
text:
UART Readings

  1. SKIP the following:
    1. Sections 14.3.4 - 14.3.8
    2. Sections 14.3.10 - 14.3.11
  2. FOCUS on the following registers: (mostly registers 1-3, and 5-8)
    1. Register 1: UART Data (UARTDR): UART#_DR_R
    2. Register 2: UART Receive Status/Error Clear (UARTRSR/UARTECR): UART#_RSR_R
    3. Register 3: UART Flag (UARTFR): UART#_FR_R
    4. Register 5: UART Integer Baud-Rate Divisor (UARTIBRD): UART#_IBRD_R
    5. Register 6: UART Fractional Baud-Rate Divisor (UARTFBRD): UART#_FBRD_R
    6. Register 7: UART Line Control (UARTLCRH): UART#_LCRH_R
    7. Register 8: UART Control (UARTCTL): UART#_CTL_R
    8. Register 10: UART Interrupt Mask (UARTIM): UART#_IM_R
    9. Register 11: UART Raw Interrupt Status (UARTRIS): UART#_RIS_R
    10. Register 12: UART Masked Interrupt Status (UARTMIS): UART#_MIS_R
    11. Register 13: UART Interrupt Clear (UARTICR): UART#_ICR_R
    12. Register 18: UART Clock Configuration (UARTCC): UART#_CC_R
  3. Textbook 8.5: for a good supplement to the Datasheet. Use as needed (~20 pages)
    1. Note: There is a nice and useful application example (Figure 8.73)

ADC Datasheet Readings

  1. SKIP the following:
    1. Section 13.3.2.2: DMA
    2. Section 13.3.2.3: Prioritization
    3. Sections 13.3.2.6 - 13.3.3: Sample Phase Control - Hardware Sample Averaging
    4. Sections 13.3.5 - 13.3.7: Differential Sampling - Digital Compart Unit
  2. Important registers:
    1. Register 1: ADC Active Sample Sequencer (ADCACTSS): ADC#_ACTSS_R
    2. Register 2: ADC Raw Interrupt Status (ADCRIS): ADC#_RIS_R
    3. Register 3: ADC Interrupt Mask (ADCIM): ADC#_IM_R
    4. Register 4: ADC Interrupt Status and Clear (ADCISC): ADC#_ISC_R
    5. Register 6: ADC Event Multiplexer Select (ADCEMUX) : ADC#_EMUX_R
      1. Only settings 0x0 and 0xF
    6. Register 11: ADC Processor Sample Sequence Initiate (ADCPSSI): ADC#_SSPRI_R
    7. Register 15,27,28,35: ADC Sample Sequence Input Multiplexer Select (0-3) (ADCSSMUX0-3): ADCn_SSMUX#_R
    8. Register 16,29,30,36: ADC Sample Sequence Control(0-3) (ADCSSCTL0-3): ADCn_SSCTL#_R
    9. Register 17-20: ADC Sample Sequence Result FIFO(0-3) (ADCSSFIFO0-3): ADC#_SSFIFO#_R
    10. Register 58: ADC Clock Configuration (ADCCC): ADC#_CC_R (Only setting 0x0)
    11. Sec 5.5, page 352: Register 68: Analog-to-Digital Converter Run Mode Clock Gating Control (RCGCADC): SYSCTL_RCGCADC_R
  3. Textbook 7.5: for a good supplement to the Datasheet. Read as needed (~30 pages)
    1. NOTE: Figure 7.8 is VERY useful and IMPORTANT
    2. NOTE: First 10 pages give a quick summary of operation
    3. NOTE: In Figure 7.8, there is no register ADCSSEMUX for the Sample Sequencer
    4. NOTE: There is also a nice application example (Figure 7.29)
